attributes.action: FACEBOOK to REMOVE HATE/BULLY GROUP AGAINST NICOLA AND CO
attributes.additional_details: wants the government to put stricter protocols against cyber bullying and hate groups based on social netwok sites. Especially when they are exposing personal details and purposefully targetting an individual to sucome and using slanderous actions that cause distress upset and emotional harm to the individulaand their family and coworker.

rejection.details: The Government is working with Facebook to improve the regulation of the internet.
